abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33355857, pmid32750141, pmid32706953, pmid33378410, pmid33356584, pmid33247152, pmid33274731, pmid33270107, pmid33220049, pmid33288662, pmid32837766, pmid33354720, pmid33285543, pmid33052873, pmid33289371
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.01.11
